Fit & Sizing
  • Slightly fitted through body.
  • Cardigan hits below waist.
  • 55% cotton , 30% polyester, 15% acrylic.
  • Machine wash.
  • Imported.

Dear Cardi,
You keep us cozy when the office AC is out of control. And you're the perfect weight for sunny-day strolls. Not to mention how soft & cute you are. If loving you is wrong, we don't want to be right.

  • Rib-knit crew neck.
  • Long sleeves, with rib-knit cuffs.
  • Nine-button front.
  • Rib-knit hem.
  • Soft, lightweight cotton blend.
  • Layering piece sold separately.
  • #340964
